name: International conference on Plastic & Cosmetic Surgery
content: Dear Colleague, Greetings! Providing new insights and solutions to accelerate Innovation, Research and Growth - these are the goals of the Cosmetics 2019, International Conference on Plastic & Cosmetic Surgery, scheduled on March 11-12, 2019 in London, UK. The scientific event focuses on the research which is currently being undertaken in the field of Plastic & Cosmetic Surgery include: Burn Care, Breast Reconstruction, Nerve Regeneration, Wound Care, Scar Treatment, Hand and Face Transplantation, Fat Grafting and Stem Cell Technology. Therefore, in line with the conference theme, Pioneering Techniques to Enhance research in Plastic and Cosmetic Surgery, the conference will offer a global platform to share vital, significant and recent research findings in the field of Plastic & Cosmetic Surgery. We have the pleasure of inviting you to Cosmetics 2019 as speakers, exhibitors, poster presenters or delegates. For more information visit http://cosmetics.alliedacademies.com/ Kind Regards, Zita Mary | Program Manager Cosmetics 2019
